item.title: Trusted Web Activity - PWA to Play Store Guide
item.description: Web developers already have a variety of interesting options for using JavaScript to write native mobile apps with tools like React Native, Cordova/Ionic, NativeScript, just to name a few. I’ve spent many hours brainstorming with clients on this topic and recently summed up my thoughts about Hybrid App development, but there’s a brand new strategy to add to the list… Trusted Web Activities (TWA). The following guide will show you how to covert any progressive web app to an Android App on the Google Play Store.
